text: Pavetta sparsipila is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania. Pavetta sparsipila is classified as Vulnerable (VU) on the IUCN Red List ==Sources== * Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. 1998. Pavetta sparsipila. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Flora of Tanzania sparsipila Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pavetta sparsipila
